ComplexFeatureTextContainer.headline: Our Story
ComplexFeatureTextContainer.subheadline: We Are A Collective Of Crafters
ComplexFeatureTextContainer.description: We walk with the sun aligning our path we move west; it's the only way that brings life We don't stray far for we know the path we are on is a means of provision and protection Conditions will beat us up; we will keep moving forward We can rest in the midst of the storms Our hope lays in the Son of all creation for we know He has already blazed a trail for us It's not a chasing after freedom; it's walking in it It's not working for Hope; its working from it It's not finding Love along the way; it's living from it! The Son is our Freedom, our Hope, and our Love The pains of this journey have suddenly lost their sting, so WE KEEP MOVING WESTWARD.
